text:
Guys I just got a theory from someone on Pinterest. I don’t think it’s true because I’m pretty sure this song is about sex or something, but they said Golden was about Harry’s younger self so I’m going to write down what I picked up.

“I know you were way too bright for me” - When harry was younger, he was more positive and more happy-go-lucky and more care free. But the following line : “I’m hopeless, broken, so you wait for me in the sky” - Now (back in 2021), Harry is sadder. He feels empty and lost (maybe after a breakup) and so he left his past self behind, or, in the sky.

“You’re so golden” - Harry is saying his past self is “golden”. Happy, beautiful. But this ties back to the “so you wait for me in the sky” - Harry might be calling himself the sun, or at least, past self. Because the sun is typically considered golden or bright at certain times. And, back in 1D, Louis had a nickname for Harry - Sun.

“I know that you’re scared because hearts get broken” - warning his past self that yes, he will deal with heartbreak and it can be hard or scary to handle. I like to imagine he was talking to his 16 year old self (fetus Harry era), and fetus Harry didn’t have much experience with dating. He dated a boy in school and had a girlfriend before the band but that’s about it (and if you’re a Larry, he was in love with Louis for nearly the whole time being in the band).

“But I can feel you take a hold. I can feel you take control for who I am and all I’ve ever known. Loving you’s the antidote” - he can feel himself at times become more carefree or happy or childish. It makes him let go temporarily of the struggles he’s dealing with, just feeling like a kid again. Loving himself (fetus Harry) for being like that at one point let’s him feel it more often, therefore it’s the antidote to his broken self.

“I know that you’re scared because I’m so open” - past self, he doesn’t know yet how open he’ll be which could lead him to more struggles, just being vulnerable and transparent. He knows that if his past self knew what he’d be like now, he’d be scared for getting older, having more experience in life that might be bad or scary.

Or, as I said before, it’s about loving someone and having sex (I can feel you take control)

text:
While listening to this song, I got into a major car accident that almost ended my life. A split second decision by the other driver and a turn of the steering wheel by a few inches saved me from being crushed by a huge truck at 65mph/105km. I was hospitalized for 8 days and still suffer from physical issues from the accident. It's slow going,  but I'm slowly recovering.....Even though it was the last thing I heard until I regained consciousness, I still love this song and it brings me so much happiness, (although it took time!)

I couldn't listen to it for awhile until I heard Harry sing it live in concert just 10 feet from me, while in the pit. It made me feel so light and happy to hear it and sing it from the top of my lungs with 10,000 other fans. I adore you Harry. 

Thanks for NOT being the last thing I ever heard! I can't wait to see how you grow over the years to come. 🫶
author: Lisa Love

text:
Dear Lola Buggy. You passed hour and a half ago. Harry Styles songs have calmed and comforted you in these last difficult weeks for you and we asked Siri to play Harry styles and it played this song. For you. Between your sedation and final shot, the DR let this song finish before giving you the last shot. You were the most beautiful absolutely incredible being I’ve ever known. Your life was amazing. I don’t feel comfortable in this apt with the horrible upstairs neighbors that even the DR in 5 minutes couldn’t believe we had been living under. Lola I’m going to struggle living here for the next two months because now it’s without you and Pepper. Lola im sorry I had to work so much. Lola im sorry Pepper died before Christmas. Lola im sorry you paced so much on these last weeks. Lola I’m pacing and pacing just like you did. Lola you were my puppy because I lost my pregnancy in 2007. Lola that means it’s like I’m loosing my 15 year old child. 


Lola “I don’t want to be alone”. 
Lola “you’re so golden, I don’t want to be alone”. 
Lola “out of my head and I know that you’re scared cuz hearts get broken”. 
Lola your heart broke in my arms. 

Lola 
“Golden, golden, golden
As I open my eyes
Hold it, focus, hoping
Take me back to the light
I know you were way too bright for me
I'm hopeless, broken
So you wait for me in the sky
Browns my skin just right,
You're so golden
You're so golden
I'm out of my head”


Rest in peace. 

Lola buggy.

text:
We all LOVE Harry and I love him too. And he has reached mega star level and I am so proud.
But you know that Buddhist saying “It costs a candle nothing to light another candle…”
And you know how some really really talented people have a harder time breaking in than Harry has had….
I just wanted to point all you Harry Stan’s in the direction of James Bay. Watch his videos, you’ll get it, because damn can he sing and He deserves Harry level fame.
Spread the love. Just trying to light another candle.
